sendActionListMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument, boolean) - Method in class it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.api.consumer.GlimpseAbstractConsumer
 
sendActionListMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument, boolean) - Method in interface it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.api.consumer.GlimpseConsumer
Send a ActionList of rules to the monitoring infrastructure requesting an evaluation.
If the request is accepted, the monitoring will answer with a responseChannel where to connect
The actionList parameter is a list of action to provide to the Monitoring
To create it, you can use ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument class.

sendTextMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, String, boolean) - Method in class it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.api.consumer.GlimpseAbstractConsumer
 
sendTextMessage(TopicConnection, InitialContext, String, String, boolean) - Method in interface it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.api.consumer.GlimpseConsumer
Send a textMessage to the monitoring infrastructure,
examples of setting up connection and behaviour of
a generic GlimpseConsumer are defined in
the GlimpseAbstractConsumer class.
